description: Number of ordered multigraphs on n labeled edges (with loops).
references: G. Labelle, Counting enriched multigraphs..., Discrete Math., 217 (2000), 237-248.
G. Paquin, Dénombrement de multigraphes enrichis, Mémoire, Math. Dept., Univ. Québec à Montréal, 2004.
author: Gilbert Labelle (gilbert(AT)lacim.uqam.ca), _Simon Plouffe_
